motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: â€¢ Approval of July 24, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes

motions.title: SECOND READ: Text Amendment to Create Regulations for Medical Cannabis Dispensaries
motions.description: Second read approval of text amendment to create regulations for medical cannabis dispensaries for dedicated, stand-alone medical dispensaries only.

motions.title: SECOND READ: RZ 23-01, 4470 Chamblee Dunwoody Road Rezoning
motions.description: Second read approval of RZ 23-01, request to rezone 4470 Chamblee Dunwoody Road from O-I to O-D.

motions.title: SECOND READ: SLUP 23-01, 4470 Chamblee Dunwoody Road Special Land Use Permit
motions.description: Second read approval of SLUP 23-01, request for a Special Land Use Permit to increase the maximum allowed height to 4-stories for 4470 Chamblee Dunwoody Road.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for personnel discussion purposes.
